title: Bulletin
additional-note: The issue renewals we have found mentioning this serial were filed under Books in CCE, usually under the issue's distinctive title. Before concluding issues of this series are in the public domain, though, search for renewals for books under the issue's distinctive title, if any.  We have not systematically done such searches for titles published in this series. Bulletin numbering may reset in some years, or be relative to the year of publication.
